quotes.text: For I know the plans I have for you, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
I can do all things through Him who strengthens me.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love Him.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
The peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds.
Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
Be still, and know that I am God.
Faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.
Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
You have the right to perform your duty, but you are not entitled to the fruits of your actions.
The soul is neither born, and nor does it die. It is eternal, ever-existing, and primeval.
When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a candle in a windless place.
A person can rise through the efforts of their own mind; they can also degrade themselves. The mind is the friend of the soul, and its enemy as well.
Whatever happened, happened for the good. Whatever is happening, is happening for the good. Whatever will happen, will also happen for the good.
Change is the law of the universe. You can be a millionaire or a pauper in an instant.
Set your heart upon your work but never on its reward.
The peace of God comes to those who are free from passion, fear, and anger, and who are steadfast in mind.
There is neither this world, nor the world beyond, nor happiness for the one who doubts.
No one who does good work will ever come to a bad end, either here or in the world to come.
Those who are wise see the same soul in all living beings, and all living beings in that one soul.
The one who has conquered themselves is far greater than the one who has defeated a thousand armies.
Verily, with hardship comes ease.
God does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
And He found you lost and guided you.
So remember Me, and I will remember you. Be thankful to Me, and never ungrateful.
And whoever puts their trust in God, He will be enough for them.
Indeed, God is with the patient.
My mercy encompasses all things.
Do not lose hope in the mercy of God. Indeed, God forgives all sins.
And We have certainly made the Quran easy for remembrance, so is there any who will remember?
He it is who sent down tranquility into the hearts of the believers, that they may grow in faith.
And your Lord says: Call upon Me, I will respond to you.
God is the Light of the heavens and the earth.
